title: LiteLLM Integration and Letta Provider Plan
body_html:
Comprehensive Plan for LiteLLM Integration and Letta Provider Creation

Phase 1: Project Setup

  1. Requirements Gathering:
    • Define specific criteria for classifying input complexity (easy vs. hard).
    • Identify the exact functionalities of the Flash and Pro models.
  2. Environment Setup:
    • Ensure you have the necessary development tools and access to Letta and OpenAI.

Phase 2: LiteLLM Integration

  1. Installation: Install LiteLLM in your development environment.
  2. Configuration:
    • Set up LiteLLM to connect with both Flash and Pro models.
    • Define routing rules based on complexity classification.
  3. Classifier Model: Develop a classifier model to assess input complexity. Consider using a pre-trained model or training a custom one.

Phase 3: Letta Provider Creation

  1. Provider Structure: Create a new provider within Letta, adhering to Letta's provider architecture.
  2. Proxy Functionality:
    • Implement logic to proxy user prompts to OpenAI.
    • Integrate the LiteLLM routing based on the classifier's output.
  3. Testing:
    • Thoroughly test the provider with various inputs, ensuring correct model selection.

Phase 4: Deployment and Monitoring

  1. Deployment: Deploy the new provider within the Letta environment.
  2. Monitoring: Implement monitoring to track performance, accuracy, and resource usage.
